content.description: The diagram shows the amount of phosphorus measured in teragrams (<math alttext="1" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> teragram <math alttext="equals" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="1 times 10 to the power 12" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>Ã—</mo><msup><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> grams), in the various reservoirs of the phosphorus cycle.
content.question: Based on the diagram, which of the following reservoirs contains the most phosphorus?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain relationships between different characteristics of environmental concepts, processes, or models represented visually. a. In theoretical contexts. b. In applied contexts.
